externalflashcompatibility: E-TTL II with EX series Speedlites, wireless multi-flash support (with optional accessory)

exposurecompensation: +/-5 EV in 1/3 or 1/2 stop increments (can be combined with AEB).
speed: 30-1/4000 sec (1/2 or 1/3 stop increments), Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
flash: Canon Speedlites (90EX, 220EX, 270EX, 270EX II, 320EX, 420EX, 430EX, 430EX II, 550EX, 580EX, 580EX II, 600EX, 600EX-RT, Macro-Ring-Lite, MR-14EX, MR-14EX II, Macro Twin Lite MT-24EX, Speedlite Transmitter ST-E2, Speedlite Transmitter ST-E3-RT)
afworkingrange: Centre AF point: EV 0 -18 (at 23°C & ISO100) Other AF points: EV 1 -18 (at 23°C & ISO100)
drivemodes: Single, Continuous, Self timer (2s, 10s+remote, 10s + continuous shots 2-10)
externalflashcontrol: via camera menu screen, except for wireless radio flash shooting settings

metadatatag: User copyright information (can be set in camera) Image rating (0-5 stars)
predictiveaf: ¹ with EF300mm f/2.8L IS USM at 50kph
settings: AWB, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten, White Fluorescent light, Flash, Custom. White balance compensation: 1. Blue/Amber +/-9 2. Magenta/ Green +/-9.
menulanguages: 25 Languages English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Portuguese, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Greek, Russian, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Romanian, Ukrainian, Turkish, Arabic, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean and Japanese
mirror: Quick-return half mirror (Transmission: reflection ratio of 40:60, no mirror cut-off with EF600mm f/4 or shorter)
afassistbeam: Intermittent firing of built-in flash or emitted by optional dedicated Speedlite
aelock: Auto: In 1-shot AF mode with evaluative metering exposure is locked when focus is achieved. Manual: By AE lock button in creative zone modes.
focallength: Equivalent to 1.6x the focal length of the lens
weightbodyonly: Approx. 480g (CIPA testing standard, including battery and memory card)
imageeraseprotection: Erase: Single image, All images in folder, Checkmarked images, unprotected images Protection: Erase protection of one image at a time
picturestyles: Auto, Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Defined (x3)
powersaving: Power turns off after 30sec or 1, 2, 4, 8 or 15mins.
metering: Real-time evaluative metering with image sensor Active metering time can be changed
depthoffieldpreview: Yes, assigned to SET button with C.Fn-9-4
canonprinters: Canon Compact Photo Printers and PIXMA Printers supporting PictBridge
batterylife: ¹ Based on the CIPA Standard and using the batteries and memory card format supplied with the camera, except where indicated

type: SD card, SDHC card or SDXC card
filenumbering: (1) Consecutive numbering (2) Auto reset (3) Manual reset
wbbracketing: +/-3 levels in single level increments 3 bracketed images per shutter release. Selectable Blue/Amber bias or Magenta/Green bias.
movietype: MOV (Video: H.264, Sound: Linear PCM, recording level can be manually adjusted by user)
focusing: Manual Focus (Magnify the image 5x or 10x at any point on screen) Autofocus: Quick mode, Live mode
brightnessadjustment: Adjustable to one of seven levels
displayformats: (1) Single image with information (2 levels) (2) Single image (3) Index display (4/9/36/100 images) (4) Jump Display (1/10/100 images, by Date,by Folder, Movies only, Stills only, by Rating)
afmodes: AI Focus One Shot AI Servo
aflock: Locked when shutter button is pressed half way in One Shot AF mode.

selectedafpointdisplay: Superimposed in viewfinder and indicated on LCD monitor

other: Hand Strap E2, GPS Receiver GP-E2

folders: New folders can be manually created and selected
